thread.title: Stewart Title Promotes Experienced Sales Director to Support Growth in Eastern Region

author: cnbc.com
title: Stewart Title Promotes Experienced Sales Director to Support Growth in Eastern Region
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Carlos Iraola has been named Sales Director for Stewart’s Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Missouri, Ohio and Tennessee direct operations. This is an expansion of Iraola’s previous role, which included leading Stewart’s sales efforts for Alabama, Arkansas, Florida and Oklahoma since 2015.
In his new scope of responsibility, he will lead a comprehensive business strategy to enhance and deploy Stewart’s growth plans and provide unified support to sales-focused associates across the Eastern Region.
“As we grow our business in the Eastern region, we need Sales Directors with proven leadership experience who can execute our growth strategy and enhance the customer experience by training, supporting and leading our Eastern sales associates,” Group Senior Vice President, Marty Albertson said. “Carlos’s 20-year business development track record is a perfect fit for this role, and his extensive knowledge of Stewart and the title industry positions us to be a title leader in the East.”
Iraola is based in Stewart’s Miami office at 255 Alhambra Circle, Suite 720, Coral Gables, FL 3313. He can be reached at ciraola@stewart.com or (305) 266-3011.
About Stewart
Stewart Information Services Corporation (NYSE-STC) is a global real estate services company, offering products and services through our direct operations, network of Stewart Trusted Providers™ and family of companies. From residential and commercial title insurance and closing and settlement services to specialized offerings for the mortgage industry, we offer the comprehensive service, deep expertise and solutions our customers need for any real estate transaction. At Stewart, we believe in building strong relationships – and these partnerships are the cornerstone of every closing, every transaction and every deal. Stewart. Real partners. Real possibilities.™ More information is available at stewart.com , subscribe to the Stewart blog at blog.stewart.com , or follow Stewart on Twitter ® @stewarttitleco .
